# eden start

# Onboarding.
eden eve onboard
stdout 'onboarded'

-- eden-config.yml --
test:
    controller: adam://{{EdenConfig "adam.ip"}}:{{EdenConfig "adam.port"}}
    eve:
      {{EdenConfig "eve.name"}}:
        onboard-cert: {{EdenConfigPath "eve.cert"}}
        serial: "{{EdenConfig "eve.serial"}}"
        model: {{EdenConfig "eve.devmodel"}}
